#set ($crDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($changeRequestDocReference)) #set ($redirectUrl = $crDoc.getURL('view')) #if ($request.get('setstatus') == 'ready') #set ($discard = $services.changerequest.setDraft($changeRequest)) #set ($discard = $response.sendRedirect($redirectUrl)) #else #set ($discard = $response.sendError(400, "Wrong status argument")) #end #end #end #else clean="false"}}

#if ($canEditReview) #if ($review.valid) #set ($buttonTitle = $services.localization.render('changerequest.sheet.tab.review.button.markinvalid.title')) #set($buttonValue = "$services.icon.renderHTML('remove') $services.localization.render('changerequest.sheet.tab.review.button.markinvalid')") #set ($buttonClass = "btn-danger") #else #set ($buttonTitle = $services.localization.render('changerequest.sheet.tab.review.button.markvalid.title') ) #set($buttonValue = "$services.icon.renderHTML('check') $services.localization.render('changerequest.sheet.tab.review.button.markvalid')") #set ($buttonClass = "btn-success") #end #elseif (!$review.valid) $services.localization.render('changerequest.sheet.tab.review.title.outdated') #end $datetool.format($review.reviewDate)

$reviewPanelTitle
